SEARCH

Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
Medicine
public class Medicine extends Object
Represents a medicine entry in the inventory. Provides methods to manage the medicine details and interact with inventory data.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicine

      public static Medicine getMedicine(String medicineName, IOHandler handler)
      Retrieves a Medicine object from the inventory by its name.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      handler - The IOHandler for CSV operations.
      Returns:
      The Medicine object, or null if not found.

    • saveData

      public void saveData() throws Exception
      Updates the medicine data and persists it to the storage.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during data saving.

    • reduceStock

      public boolean reduceStock(int amount)
      Reduces the stock of the medicine by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to reduce from the stock.
      Returns:
      True if the stock was successfully reduced, false otherwise.
